summary: 2002 VOLVO S60 SUDDENLY STOPPED ON A BUSY TWO-LANE HIGHWAY/COMPLETE ELECTRICAL POWER SYSTEM FAILURE/UNABLE TO RE-START CAR/CAR TOWED TO DEALER/DEALER ABLE TO RESTART CAR AFTER CAR SAT UNTOUCHED ON LOT FOR SEVERAL DAYS/TWO DIFFERENT VOLVO DEALERSHIPS LOOKED AT CAR AND WERE UNABLE TO EXPLAIN WHY FAILURE OCCURRED/(CAR ALSO HAD TO HAVE BRAKE SENSOR PAD REPLACED BECAUSE OF INTERMITANT CRUISE CONTROL FAILURE AND SHIFTING COLUMN LOCK UP; STILL EXPERIENCE POOR AM RADIO RECEPTION WHILE RECHARGING CELL PHONE)
